thread.title: BRIEF-Mercal Capital Announces Termination Of Qualifying Transaction With Folia Biotech

title: BRIEF-Mercal Capital Announces Termination Of Qualifying Transaction With Folia Biotech
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Mercal Capital Corp:
* MERCAL CAPITAL CORP. ANNOUNCES TERMINATION OF QUALIFYING TRANSACTION WITH FOLIA BIOTECH INC. AND THE ENTERING INTO OF A NEW QUALIFYING TRANSACTION WITH SERENITY CBD CANADA INC.
* MERCAL CAPITAL CORP - PURSUANT TO LETTER OF INTENT DATED FEB 22, MERCAL AND SERENITY INTEND TO ENTER INTO A SHARE EXCHANGE AGREEMENT
* MERCAL CAPITAL- PARTIES SHALL AGREE ON RESIGNATIONS OF SOME DIRECTORS OF MERCAL, APPOINTMENT OF SOME NEW DIRECTORS TO MERCALâ€˜S BOARD MAY BE MADE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
